titleStmt.title: The two great questions consider'd I. What the French king will do, with respect to the Spanish monarchy. II. What measures the English ought to take.
titleStmt.author: Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Charles Mount, near Holburn,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Daniel Defoe.
